tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_schedule (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_schedule (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    organizer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (organizer_id) REFERENCES employee_schedule(employee_id)
);
CREATE TABLE employee ( employee_id INT, employee_name VARCHAR(255), work_schedule VARCHAR(255), availability BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE meeting ( meeting_id INT, meeting_name VARCHAR(255), meeting_datetime DATETIME, meeting_location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE schedule ( schedule_id INT, employee_id INT, date DATE, work_hours INT );
CREATE TABLE meeting_attendance ( attendance_id INT, employee_id INT, meeting_id INT, is_attending BOOLEAN );

CREATE TABLE employee_schedule (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_schedule (
    meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    remote_meeting BOOLEAN
);
